name: Dino Chomps
description:
This is a game where you have to get to the end of the platforms without dying from hunger. Use food along the way to regain your health but after each level you have to choose a food. While playing the next level you can only each that type of food. 

Only the pie, bread and  watermelon work right now.

The controls are the ARROW KEYS, WASD KEYS or a gamepad and Xbox controller.

All art is based off other peoples free art packs.

Dino is by  @ScissorMarks (twitter)

Food is by https://itch.io/profile/henrysoftware (itch.io)

Clouds by https://itch.io/profile/quintino-pixels (itch.io)

Floor by https://itch.io/profile/blackdragon1727 (itch.io)
